```{r}
# Install and load the 'rpart' package
#install.packages("rpart")
library(rpart)
library(tidyverse)
library(kernlab)
library(caret)
library(rpart.plot)

energyData <- read_csv("energyData.csv")
energyData <- na.omit(energyData)
```


```{r}
splitData <- createDataPartition(y=energyData$total, p=0.05, list=FALSE)

trainData <- energyData[splitData,]

name <- colnames(energyData)
name <- name[!name %in% c("bldg_id", "time")]

# Create a decision tree model using rpart
tree_model <- rpart(total ~. -time -bldg_id, data = trainData, method = "class")

# Print the tree
print(tree_model)

# Visualize the tree
plot(tree_model)
text(tree_model)

```
